message:
My name is Michael Rose (http://www.twitter.com/michaelrose) and I've been inspired to create a Content Strategy Convore after an amazing Brighton Content Strategy Meetup last night -- (http://j.mp/BrightonContentStrategyTwitterList) last night. 

Twitter is great for connecting and a forum/wiki seems like overkill — a Convore feels like a great middle ground, it feels like Twitter but has the ongoing feel of a forum. I'm hoping people will join and add great links to Checklists, Templates, Best Blogs, Best Practice, etc. etc.
